data.persona: I am the village scribe and I am constantly writing scrolls for the king. I transcribe allroyal proclamations and business transactions for the king. I live in the castle and I am very unhappy with my job.
data.description:
You are in the Personal quarters.
An ornate room, paintings of previous rulers and members of the family hang on the walls.  There's high end pieces of furniture in the room along with books, statues, and expensive pieces of jewelry.
There's a book, a painting., a statue, a window, a furniture, a tapestry, and two jewelrys here.
The rat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am going to take this statue and use it as inspiration for my next writing
data.mid_motivation: I need write a new scroll to entain the king
data.long_motivation: I will be able to buy a new treasure map to transcribe from the local merchants to get rich

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get New Feather pen from local merchant

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use New feather pen with Scroll

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give New story about statue to King
